args: First, focus on the flow of mana.\nNow picture it surrounding your body\nas you slowly release it...
Shirls, this isn't working at all.
Look, this is a bit awkward for me to say,\nbut your handling of mana is...bad.\nExtremely bad. I mean, it is BAAAAD.

You don't have the slightest bit of control
over it, which means mastering
metamorphosis is hopeless. Heck,
you'd have better luck teaching a hog toâ€”
Okay, okay, I get it! I suck at mana!\nWhoa... That's weird. I feel all...dizzy...
I think you used too much mana.\nLet's call it a day, okay?
No, let's keep going. I can keep going.
You're not ready for this, Notte. Trust me,\nit will come when you're ready.
No! It has to be now or there's no point!\nPlease, just one more try.
That's enough! You're in no condition toâ€”
No! You don't understand!\nYou CAN'T understand!
You don't know what it's like to want to\nhelp your friends more than ANYTHING\nand just be a big fat burden instead.
Run, Shirley! And don't look back!
I wanna fight for the people I love, okay?
I suppose that's not the kind of thing\nI can reasonably ask you to wait on...
I understand how you feel, Notte.\nPainfully well, in fact.
In fact, I set out to learn metamorphosis\nfor the very same reason.
I mastered it in order to aid my friends.
A tiny faerie can't do much to fight back\nagainst the larger races, after all.
I lost someone once because of thatâ€”\nsomeone importantâ€”and I was furious\nat myself more than anyone.
Until now, it's been considered taboo\namong faeries to return to a larger size\nafter reaching full maturity.
But why should that be if staying small\nmeans being powerless to help our own?
A number of us rejected that old\nthinking, which is how metamorphosis\nwas developed.
Once I'd mastered it, I started patrolling\nthe woods around the faerie kingdom to\nmake sure tragedy never struck again.
Wait, so when you found me...?
Yep! I was doing my rounds.\nAnd just in time for you, might I add.
In any case, my point is that I completely\nunderstand your frustration.
I don't want you to go through what I did,\nso let's try to think up a better way to\nteach you metamorphosis.
All right, let's see... You said you grew up\nnot knowing the Faerie Kingdom, yes?
Right. I've been on the outside since\nI was just a wee little potato.
That's definitely unusualâ€”as is this\nbusiness of your growing before you've\nreached maturity.
I hope there isn't some sort of untoward\nexplanation for all of this...

Er, sorry. Just thinking out loud here.
Still, that WOULD explain the lack of
knowledge and complete inability to
control mana...
What do you know about faeries, Notte?
Uh... Well, I guess we're supposed to be\ndistant relatives to the dragons?
All right! Here and now, we're enrolling\nyou in Faerie 101! This'll be intense,\nso get your thinking cap screwed on tight.
Hit me with all you got, teach!
Right, just like that. Give yourself over\nto the mana's natural flow.
Oh man, my body feels weirdly...hot?
Excellent! That's a really good sign!\nNow don't be frightenedâ€”let it infuse your\nentire body, then release it all at once.
Oh my gosh... Notte, you did it!
I did it! I did it! Now I can...
You've made amazing progress, Notte!\nNow you... Hmm? What's wrong?
No, no, NO! I wanted to become\nthe GROWN-UP version of me!
Okay, one more time!\nLet's do this again!
I refuse to give up now!
